title: Fragment, late 18th–early 19th century
medium:
Medium: pineapple fiber (warp); silk (weft); tempera 
Technique: printed and painted on gauze
description: Cream-colored ground with slender intersecting serpentine stems and blossoms of various types and colors, some tied with ribbons in red, dark pink, green, blue, brown, purple, yellow, gray and iridescent paint.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, late 18th–early 19th century.
late 18th–early 19th century. Medium: pineapple fiber (warp); silk (weft); tempera 
Technique: printed and painted on gauze. Gift of Jacob H. Schiff. 1906-21-29.
